rundown: 3-1 W @ Philadelphia Phillies Hurston Waldrep: 5.2 innings, 1 earned run, 4 hits, 1 HR, 9 strikeouts Batters: Drake Baldwin (1 hits - 3 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Michael Harris II (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) Jake Fraley (2 hits - 3 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves secured a victory against the Phillies with a strong performance from their starting pitcher and key contributions from their hitters. Waldrep's dominant outing, highlighted by 9 strikeouts, kept the Phillies' offense in check. Baldwin's home run and 2 RBIs were crucial in driving the Braves' scoring. Key highlights include: 1. Hurston Waldrep's impressive 9 strikeouts over 5.2 innings. 2. Drake Baldwin's impactful home run, contributing 2 RBIs. 3. The Braves' solid defense limiting the Phillies to just 1 run.
